name: Saikyo Robots: Prologue
description:
If you want more, we got more! By the end of the year we will release Saikyo Robots!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2428750

Saikyo Robots combines 'strategy' and 'roguelike' together.
Daytimes are calm. You command your army, grow it, and explore the wasteland.
At night enemies will relentlessly attack your base. Defend it all cost.
Upgrade your base and army to create the strongest robot army there is!


Features:
your robot army to gather resources, produce robots, fight enemies and more!





each level for upgrades, resources and robots to grow stronger





your army and base to make it an unstoppable force





thousands of enemies attacking you night after night. Build powerful towers and robots to fight back with your mighty robot army.
